body_html:
thanks, it works.
I have successfully built cifar10 by /home/lli/bazel/output/bazel build -c opt --config=cuda --spawn_strategy=standalone --verbose_failures //tensorflow/models/image/cifar10:cifar10
but how can I run it?
$python cifar10_train.py --data_dir=/home/lli/cifar10_data
Traceback (most recent call last):
File "cifar10_train.py", line 43, in
import tensorflow.python.platform
ImportError: No module named tensorflow.python.platform
How can I build all thing like it's installed by pip?

body:
thanks, it works.
I have successfully built cifar10 by /home/lli/bazel/output/bazel build -c opt --config=cuda --spawn_strategy=standalone --verbose_failures //tensorflow/models/image/cifar10:cifar10
but how can I run it?
$python cifar10_train.py --data_dir=/home/lli/cifar10_data
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "cifar10_train.py", line 43, in <module>
    import tensorflow.python.platform
ImportError: No module named tensorflow.python.platform
How can I build all thing like it's installed by pip?
